roleset.name: help, assist

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The UN's assistance to Africa began several years ago.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: John's emergency assistance to earthquake-ravaged California was very admirable.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb assist.01, OntoNotes grouping assistance-n sense 1; maps to VN class help-72-1. Framed by Claire.
